front.title: PCEP Extension for Native IP Network

abstract.t: This document defines the PCEP extension for PCE application in Native IP network. The scenario and architecture of PCE in native IP is described in [I-D.draft-wang-teas-pce-native-ip-01.txt]. This draft describes the key information that is transferred between PCE and PCC to accomplish the end2end traffic assurance in Native IP network under central control mode.
